Docs.param: A description of the effect of allowing the transaction to complete, which is used by the design host to give the user an opportunity to cancel the operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions) cil managed

Docs.param: A collection of control designer regions for the associated control.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the HTML markup to display the control and populates the collection with the current control designer regions.
Docs.returns: The design-time HTML markup for the associated control, including all control designer regions.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void OnComponentChanged (object sender, System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnComponentChanged(object sender, class System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce) cil managed

Docs.summary: Called when the associated control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The OnComponentChanged method is called when a property of the associated control is changed. This lets you perform any processing that is required after a property change.

Docs.param: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object containing the properties for the class of the component.
